con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonOutput; import java.util.Date;
Date date = new Date(); endPoint = messageExchange.getEndpoint() testStep = context.getCurrentStep().getLabel() datetime = date.format("dd-M-yyyy hh:mm:ss a zz") timeStamp = date.format("dd_M_yyyy_hh_mm_ss_a_zz") testCase = context.getCurrentStep().getTestCase().getLabel() req_head = messageExchange.getRequestHeaders() request = messageExchange.getRequestContent() resp_head = messageExchange.getResponseHeaders() response = messageExchange.getResponseContent() path = context.expand( '${projectDir}')+"\results"
File dir = new File(path); if (!dir.exists()) { dir.mkdir(); }
def fout = new File(path+"\"+testCase+" - "+testStep+"_"+timeStamp+".txt")
fout.write("<!--=======================================================================================================================
","UTF-8") fout.append("Time Submitted : "+datetime+"
") fout.append("End Point Used : "+endPoint+"
") fout.append("Time Taken : "+messageExchange.timeTaken+"ms
") fout.append("Executed in : "+testCase+" - "+testStep+"_"+timeStamp) fout.append("
============================================================================================================================
"+"REQUEST

","UTF-8") fout.append(req_head) fout.append("-->

") fout.append(request) fout.append("

","UTF-8") fout.append("<!--=======================================================================================================================
"+"RESPONSE

","UTF-8") fout.append(resp_head) fout.append("-->

") fout.append(response) fout.append("

","UTF-8") fout.append("<!--========================================================================================================================-->","UTF-8")
